biotools.summary: EVR is a chromosome 3D structure reconstruction tool using an Error-Vector Resultant algorithm based on DNA interaction data. With normalized or unnormalized IF matrix as input, the program generate a chromosome 3D structure output in a .pdb file. Using Cython and OpenCL, the program can run on CPUs/GPUS/APUs and thus usually faster than similar tools.
